title: Merge pull request #30 from francais-harry/date_format_mt_safe
message:
Merge pull request #30 from francais-harry/date_format_mt_safe

Added synchronized block to avoid multi thread issue of SimpleDateFormat

title: Added synchronized block to avoid multi thread issue of SimpleDateFormat
message:
Added synchronized block to avoid multi thread issue of SimpleDateFormat

Because SimpleDateFormat is not thread safe, added synchronized
block to avoid unexpected error due to multi thread use.

title: Added logic to remove credential data when server respond HTTP 400
message:
Added logic to remove credential data when server respond HTTP 400

When user revokes permission of the app from Lifelog web page, server
responds with HTTP 400 error code for API call from client. So added
logic to clear credential data in such case.

title: Moved dependency of gradle plugin from top level to lib level
message:
Moved dependency of gradle plugin from top level to lib level

When the library is included to app project by git submodule i.e.
as source code, build.gradle of the library should be self-contained.
Because including app has its own top level build.gradle, it does
not set dependency to gradle plugin of the library specific.

title: Merge pull request #22 from francais-harry/volley_start_stop
message:
Merge pull request #22 from francais-harry/volley_start_stop

Call start method of Volley thread to ensure auth operation start

title: Call start method of Volley thread to ensure auth operation start
message:
Call start method of Volley thread to ensure auth operation start

Because VolleySingleton class is public and visible, client app may
stop the thread of Volley to suppress battery consumption etc.
Call start API explicitly to ensure for operation start.

title: Updated Lifelog.checkAuthentication to signal error case to callback
message:
Updated Lifelog.checkAuthentication to signal error case to callback

There is chance of error happens during refreshing of auth token.
Related class was updated to handle error case of it.

title: Fixed callback of checkAuthentication API to avoid duplicate call
message:
Fixed callback of checkAuthentication API to avoid duplicate call

Previous logic calls callback twice, in case of success of check.
Code is updated to avoid it. Also credential will be reset in case if
auth token is not available due to some reason just in case.

title: Changed request header of API call to inherit value from super class
message: Changed request header of API call to inherit value from super class

message:

To reduce duplicated code in API call logic, super class was
introduced.

title: Updated README.md about handling of resultCode in onActivityResult
message:
Updated README.md about handling of resultCode in onActivityResult

Because with the latest code, resultCode indicates success or
failure of login attempt. So README.md is updated to reflect the
latest situation.

title: Updated API name and valuable name to follow standard naming convention
message:
Updated API name and valuable name to follow standard naming convention

Updated to follow naming convention of Android OS default.
https://source.android.com/source/code-style.html#java-language-rules

title: Minimized access scope in LifeLog class
message: Minimized access scope in LifeLog class

title: Split internal logic of api calls to secure token refresh beforehand
message:
Split internal logic of api calls to secure token refresh beforehand

Original code has timing issue of auth token retrival, when auth token
expired and refresh is required. Internal logic of API call is updated
to ensure auth token refresh before actual API call, if required.

title: Fixed JSON parser to be able to get refreshed token from server
message:
Fixed JSON parser to be able to get refreshed token from server

Original code was not able to parse JSON from server.

title: Added log only for debug build in token refresh operation
message: Added log only for debug build in token refresh operation

title: Merge pull request #13 from francais-harry/dead_code
message:
Merge pull request #13 from francais-harry/dead_code

Removed dead code in API request code

title: Merge pull request #12 from francais-harry/expire_time_fix
message:
Merge pull request #12 from francais-harry/expire_time_fix

Fixed expire time calculation logic of refreshing auth token

title: Removed dead code in API request code
message:
Removed dead code in API request code

In case of 401 error response from server, onErrorResponse will be
called by Volley framework. So handling of 401 error in onResponse
is dead code.

title: Fixed expire time calculation logic of refreshing auth token
message:
Fixed expire time calculation logic of refreshing auth token

"expires_in" parameter value from web API indicates expire time in
second since web API call time. Logic is updated to use the value
correctly.

title: Fixed request URL building logic for location API
message:
Fixed request URL building logic for location API

Original logic did not append "&" charactor between parameters.

title: Fixed ISO8601 date formatter to use UTC always
message:
Fixed ISO8601 date formatter to use UTC always

Original code was not able to convert Calendar to String. In order
to get same format result always, time zone is fixed to UTC always.

title: Fixed login/logout toggle state handling bug in sample code
message:
Fixed login/logout toggle state handling bug in sample code

Instead of login button, logout button was shown when user is not
logged in.

title: Put out log only for debuggable build case
message: Put out log only for debuggable build case

title: Changed to use App Context in APIs to avoid potential memory leak
message:
Changed to use App Context in APIs to avoid potential memory leak

Using of Activity as Context might cause memory leak in some cases,
switched to use App Context in API. This will make future maintenance
of class easier.

Removed a static valuable and changed to use preference always for
auth token. It simplifies class design and handling especially for
clearing of user credentials i.e. logout.

message: typo

message: update jitpack info

title: Updated callback of access token retrival, especially for error case
message:
Updated callback of access token retrival, especially for error case

By utilizing of onActivityResult API, now client is able to know
auth failure case.

title: Put out log contains access token only for debug build
message:
Put out log contains access token only for debug build

Because the project is android library, normal Build.DEBUG flag is
not available. So utility class is introduced.

title: Switched to use Google original Volley instead of forked version
message:
Switched to use Google original Volley instead of forked version

Since Google released original version of Volley to jCenter and
mcxiaoke's Volley library is now deprecated, switched to use
Google version.

title: Minimized access level of member valuables of GetAuthTokenTask
message: Minimized access level of member valuables of GetAuthTokenTask

title: Updated parameter names for JSON of access token response
message:
Updated parameter names for JSON of access token response

Some of parameter name of JSON does not included in response
from server, and it causes unexpected behavior of logic during
access token retrival. Updated JSON parsing logic to get
access token etc from server properly.

title: Updated logic to calculate expired time of token for Sony login
message:
Updated logic to calculate expired time of token for Sony login

At least Sony Entertainment Network does not return "expires" param
and it only contains "expires_in" param in second. Updated logic to
calculate expiration time for token update.

title: Updated VolleySingleton to always use Application Context
message:
Updated VolleySingleton to always use Application Context

Passing of Activity as Context may cause long live Activity, it would
be treated as memory leak of Java.

message: Added configChanges to prevent page reload by orientation change

message:

Now user can go back to previous URL by HW back key etc. Loading
indicator is also added.

title: Fixed to apppend correct format of scope parameter for auth request
message: Fixed to apppend correct format of scope parameter for auth request

message:
Moved definition of Activity from app to lib manifest

By moving to lib, parent app does not need to declare Activity on
their manifest, more useful as library project.

Merge pull request #1 from francais-harry/build_issue_fix

title: Switched to use Volley API available in Google master repo
message:
Switched to use Volley API available in Google master repo

API used in LifelogLocationAPI does not available in master repo
of Volley in Google. Switched to use available one.

title: Removed allowBack attribute from manifest of lib project
message:
Removed allowBack attribute from manifest of lib project

Because it causes build error of parent app in case of it conflicts.
Conceptually allowBackup attribute should be defined by parent app
and library project should not have it.

title: Removed unused Android support lib from gradle file in lib project
message:
Removed unused Android support lib from gradle file in lib project

It causes build error when developer import the library project to
some app, and the app has dependency to the Android support lib.
